hero.title: Master the Art of
hero.subtitle: Join the world's most advanced competitive programming platform. Train with a vast repository, compete in real-time, and climb the global leaderboards.

features.title: Everything you need to <1>excel</1>
features.subtitle: Our platform provides the tools and environment you need to push your coding skills to the limit.

ide.title: Advanced IDE
ide.description: Full-featured online IDE with IntelliSense, debugging tools, and multi-language support.

judge.title: Real-time Judge
judge.description: Instant feedback on your submissions with detailed execution metrics and test case analysis.

battles.title: Code Battles
battles.description: Challenge friends or random opponents in 1v1 coding duels or battle royale modes.

leaderboards.title: Global Leaderboards
leaderboards.description: Climb the ranks in regional and global leaderboards. Earn badges and recognition.

repository.title: Vast Repository
repository.description: Access thousands of problems from past competitions (ICPC, IOI, Codeforces, etc.).

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Deep insights into your coding patterns, strengths, and areas for improvement.

showcase.title: Code at the speed of thought
showcase.subtitle: Experience a development environment designed for speed, accuracy, and comfort.

leaderboard.title: Global Leaderboard
leaderboard.subtitle: Compete with the best developers from around the world and earn your place at the top.

footer.description: The ultimate platform for competitive programming. Train, compete, and conquer the coding world.
